description.value:
Poisonous nets that cover 6 square metres, can be packed up to the size of a fist (avoid skin contact however). Can be launched with an arrow. When deployed, apply Toxic and Snare Qualities, the toxin affecting any that the net makes skin contact with.

Effect: Rare

Notes: 85 T
